Header: Central Troops Learn About HIV & AIDS
Content: A valuable lecture on Human Immune Deficiency Virus and Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (HIV/AIDS) was conducted at the Security Forces Headquarters â€“ Central (SFHQ-C), Diyathalawa on Wednesday (5) to coincide with the World AIDS Day. This awareness lecture was organized on a suggestion of the Commander, Security Forces - Central (SF-C) Major General Ruwan De Silva. 84 troops including Officers listened to the lecture. Dr Thusitha Attanayake of Badulla District hospital HIV/AIDS and Sexually Transmitting Diseases Prevention Unit delivered the lectures.
